forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a gentle charm, the air crisp yet welcoming, brushed by a westward breeze that hints at the cool caress of spring. As the day wears on, sunshine will filter through the clouds, with temperatures peaking modestly at around sixty-four degrees before yielding to a cooler afternoon. Currently, the cityscape is partly draped in toothsome cloud cover, with glimpses of blue peeking through, a crisp reminder of the marine layer that wraps around the Golden Gate and touches the hills beyond.

The weather holds a certain appeal, with the projected clarity both invigorating and serene, a perfect backdrop for a long stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a leisurely hour spent in a favorite café, coffee in hand, watching the world navigate the lively streets. Given the coolness anticipated this afternoon, layering is wise—perhaps a light jacket or sweater will suffice as the sun dips lower. San Francisco thrives on its easy pace; a walk through the Presidio, with its sweeping views of the bay, or a contemplative moment at Crissy Field to breathe in the salty air could align beautifully with this afternoon's promise.
